Message.Title: Limiting factor to Windows 8 sales ...
Message.Msg: I believe Win8 would be hugely successful were it not for the limiting factor of the touch-screen monitor. Try to find a PC with one which ships before December. Probably does make no sense to upgrade or buy Win8 otherwise.

Message.Title: Barclay is bashing HP and Dell everyday
Message.Msg: Everyday someone from Barclay is bashing PC maker, I wonder how many shares they shorted HP and Dell, and how much investments do they have in tablets? I smell nervousness from them; the tablet market is fizzled out and going down hill from here given windows 8.

Fiscal Cliff
Message.Msg: Banks converting and selling foreclosure debts-- didn't go away, actually made things worse. Bush's programs are coming to an end. Most states are in debt, can't afford sustain current jobs. Obama meeting up with CEOs to #$%$ how bad the market will be when #$%$ hits the fans Some analysts predicting this to be much worse than 2008
